meanings.definition: Reduced in size as a result of being dried or cooked.
meanings.sent1: The shrunken apple looked tiny and wrinkled.
meanings.sent2: Her shrunken sweater no longer fit her properly.
meanings.sent3: The shrunken raisins in the cookie made it taste extra sweet.
meanings.sent4: The shrunken map made it hard to navigate the city.
meanings.sent5: The shrunken toy car was barely visible among the other toys.

meanings.sent1: The fabric will shrunken if you wash it in hot water.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally shrunken my favorite shirt in the dryer.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to shrunken as he pulled out a rabbit.
meanings.sent4: His confidence shrunken as the presentation went on.
meanings.sent5: The flowers shrunken in the cold winter air.

meanings.sent1: The shrunken balloon slowly deflated in the room.
meanings.sent2: The shrunken population of the town led to fewer schools being built.
meanings.sent3: The shrunken ice cream cone was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her shrunken patience was evident in her short responses.
meanings.sent5: The shrunken shadow of the tree stretched across the yard.
